Name: Cabernet Sauvignon Reserva
Wine Description: The notes of ripe red fruit, black pepper, vanilla, fruits dry and classic aromas note herbs like tarragon and bay leaf.

Name: Barolo
Wine Description: Aromas of violet, rose, red berry, vineyard dust and alpine herbs float from the glass. The savory, bright palate delivers crushed Morello cherry, red raspberry, graphite and clove alongside polished tannins and brisk acidity.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: A rich, opaque purple in color, offers up aromas of ripe blackberry, black currant, pie spice and vanilla, revealing greater spice, tobacco and notes of bittersweet chocolate on the palate. Very well-balanced with a long, decadent finish.

Name: Crianza
Wine Description: Deep ruby. Assertive scents of blueberry, blackberry, vanilla and cola with complicating floral and licorice nuances. Sweet and pliant in the mouth displaying good clarity and lift to its smoke accented dark fruit and spicecake flavors. This wine finishes with smooth tannins and very good spicy persistence.

Name: Réserve Grenache - Syrah Côtes-du-Rhône
Wine Description: Medium ruby with purple hues; ripe fruit fills the aromas, along with spice, earth and a hint floral; dry and medium body the flavours show more dark fruit, soft texture, supple tannins and a medium finish.

Name: Vino Nobile di Montepulciano Riserva
Wine Description: Brilliant ruby red with a tendency to garnet. Ethereal, extraordinarily elegant with hints of violet and wood. Dry, harmonic, fruity and velvety, with an elegant texture and long finish.

Name: Mourvèdre
Wine Description: The nose initially displays bright red cherry, fresh cranberry and dragon fruit scents.On the palate, bright acidity in the true.

Name: UNO Malbec
Wine Description: Wine Offers delicious plums, strawberries and blackberry flavours with enticing hints of violets, venilla, and milk chocolate. Brightened by carefully protected natural acidity, this violet-red intense wine is surprisingly versatile at the sining table.

Name: Valpolicella Classico
Wine Description: Bright ruby ​​red color. The nose shows the typical characteristics of with a fresh and inviting cherry which opens to an extraordinary flavor and enjoyment.

Name: Reserva
Wine Description: Intense Red brick. Balance aromas reminiscent of red fruit and vanilla gentle well balanced with a long finish elegant structure with a big persistence ending.

Name: Domaine Guy Mousset Côtes du Rhône Rouge
Alto Vulture Aglianico del Vulture
Wine Description: Ruby red with vivid purple hue, bright and impenetrable.The nose is complex and characterized by aromas of small black berries in jam, licorice, carob and greek hay on a spicy background.The taste is powerful and smooth, characterized by velvety tannins and a long finish and pleasant balsam.

Name: Ad Astra Maremma Toscana
Wine Description: Deep ruby red, suggestive nose of plums and berries and with a hint of licorice; a fine wine with a complex bouquet.

Name: Médoc
Wine Description: Dark purple color with purple reflections, nose of ripe red berries and blackcurrant, ripe and melted tannins, In the mouth good balance between acidity and tannins, between fruit and spices, good length.

Name: Red Blend
Wine Description: Dark-fleshed plum and red cherry flavors, together with red licorice and dried peach. Notes of violet, lavender, sour cherry, black cherry, spearmint, cola, vanilla cream, toasted oak and new leather contribute complexity and depth. This medium-bodied wine has a twist of acidity on the entry and finishes with silky, juicy tannins.

Name: Beaujolais-Villages
Wine Description: Strong red purple colour. Fresh red fruits on the nose with a hint of dark cherry. Slightly spicy with a touch of grey pepper, liquorice and a touch of rose flower. The whole wine is very well balanced with a nice acidity and the tannins presence on the finish.

Name: Mercurey Les Mauvarennes
Wine Description: Under the ruby colour, the nose is medium and complex. Enjoy this dry, medium-bodied and fruity red featuring refreshing acidity. On the palate, it showcases smooth tannins and a broad mouthfeel that leads into a medium finish.

Name: Chianti Classico
Wine Description: Bright ruby red color. On the nose notes of blackberries, leather, cherries and red currant with a touch of liquorice and vanilla. Sweet and persistent tannins.

Name: Garrigues Vacqueyras
Wine Description: It has deep red wine. On the nose an explosion of red fruits. In the mouth, a lovely tannic structure, aromas of the ‘Garrigues’ or plains, and underwood.

Name: Mordecai Red
Wine Description: An enticing nose of pepper, violets, cigar and cassis. On the palate it is a mouthwatering mélange of red berry and plum flavors backed by earthy tones of herb roasted meat and fresh black trumpet giving way to a spice laden finish.

Name: Chianti Classico
Wine Description: Deep ruby red, with light burgundy reflections. Full and intense, with notes of small wild berries and pleasing scents of noble wood, vanilla and cocoa.

Name: Cahors Malbec
Wine Description: There is a note of cherry, sweet plum and raspberry flavours. Well-spiced, with hints of mint and dark chocolate on the finish. The wine displays full balance between the tannins and the fruit.

Name: Viejos Vinedos en Pie Franco Malbec
Wine Description: Dark red color with violet shiny tones. A very complex and elegant wine with aromas of wild black berries, black cherries, liquorice and floral aromas. Perfectly balanced with a great structure, round and elegant finish.

Name: Bordeaux Supérieur
Wine Description: This wine is renowned for its deep dark red colour, fine concentration, suppleness due the ripe Merlot. It has aroma of back and red fruits (blackcurrants, blackberries, prunes) with subtle toasted overtones of vanilla. It is well balanced, long in the mouth.

Name: Time Waits For No One (Double Skull)
Merlot
Wine Description: Light to medium red color filled with aromas of black cherries and spice. A smooth-tasting red wine with hints of oak, berries and soft tannins makes for an enjoyable experience.

Name: Gouleyant Malbec
Wine Description: Its color is dark cherry red. Its nose is typical of the shows notes of ripe red and black fruits such as Cherry, blackberry, Raspberry. Its mouth is also very fruity and finishes on soft and elegant tannins.

Name: Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Ruby red in color with aromas of ripe cherry, cola and sarparilla, this full-bodied and fruity wine is inviting on the palate. Lush black cherry and raspberry fruit.

Name: Barolo
Wine Description: Red, with yellowish orange hints due to the ageing process. Dry, velvety and austere, with a bouquet of faded rose and of violet.

Name: Etna Rosso
Wine Description: Initially smelling like a blackberries jelly. Very mineral and fragrant too. Something new in my palate. Sightly sweet with acid. Perfectly matched with a mozzarella, tomatoes and basil salad. Really liked it.

Name: Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Has a silky and lush texture with raspberry aromas that lead into bright cherry and red fruit flavors. The finish is long and smooth, with delicate notes of vanilla and toast. It is a wine that pairs deliciously with roast chicken, lamb, pork, tuna and mild sausages.

Name: Baron Herzog Old Vine Zinfandel
Wine Description: Deep red color; full bodied wine with rich concentrated flavors and lush mouth feel. Big effusive aromas of ripe blackberry and raspberries balanced with vanilla and spice from the French oak aging. Grapes harvested entirely from Watts Pescador and Locust Tree Vineyards after reaching full maturity. Pescador vineyard was planted in the 1930's. A ten percent saignee taken after destemming and crushing. French oak aging for eight months with light filtration at bottling.

Name: Châteauneuf-du-Pape
Wine Description: Robe with purple reflections. Color reveals distinctive violet highlights. The complex nose reveals aromas of violets and fruits of the woods. A refined and complex nose showing aromas and fruits of the forest. The attack in the mouth is generous and intense. The structure is balanced and harmonious.

Name: Sancerre Rouge
Wine Description: Intense fruit on the nose here, with a little beetroot, spice and anise. There is a freshness to the aroma too, alongside some smoky oak. Soft and silky on the palate, structured, with a grip of ripe tannins. Flavours of wild cherries, earth and dry herbs are framed by gentle acidity. Best of all, this tastes like a text book Pinot Noir in the grand Burgundian style at a very reasonable price. No surprise, this is a brilliant food wine.

Name: Châteauneuf-du-Pape Rouge
Wine Description: Deep garnet red colour. A very fruity nose with concentrated red berries, leather and liquorice. Great complexity and strength on the palate. Excellent Persistence.

Name: Miros de Ribera Crianza
Wine Description: This fleshy red offers rich flavors of blackberry, dark chocolate, licorice and toast, with ganache and spice notes that lend this a mulled character. The taste is rich and satisfying, and the aftertaste is very long.

Name: Rioja Gran Reserva
Wine Description: Bright red and garnet with a rim turning to brick showing its extended ageing in barrel and bottle. Complex aromas from its development and ageing, mature ripe black fruit, and vanilla and cinnamon spice, with a deep mineral core. Velvety smooth, harmonious with a fresh finish.

Name: Pizazz Zin Old Vine Zinfandel (Pizazz Ranch)
Castello di Volpaia Chianti Classico Riserva
Wine Description: Ruby red with a trace of garnet. Elegant intense with hints of spices good connected with fruity scents. Good structure with evident tannins and long persistence.

Name: Zinfandel
Wine Description: Aromas of ripe red currants and fresh Strawberries, the wine is medium dark purple.

Name: Maremma Toscana Mongrana
Wine Description: Mongrana is the quintessential expression of the colors, sights and sounds of the Maremma region: fruity and intense, fresh and embracing.

Name: Diamond Collection Merlot
Wine Description: Our Diamond Collection Merlot offers lushness offset by a lovely framework of toasted woods and subtle tannins that harmonize with the wine’s ripe, dark fruit nuances.

Name: Castelgreve Chianti Classico
Wine Description: It has deep ruby ​​red color, this Chianti Classico made from Sangiovese grapes comes with elegant aromas, notes of violet and ripe fruit nuances. Full flavor, balanced with soft and velvety tannins, lingering finish.

Name: Pinot Noir
Wine Description: A burst of fresh black cherry, ripe strawberry and cola spice on the nose lead to deep flavors of red fruits with hints of earth, warm spice and violets. Supple tannins are balanced by exuberant acidity on a long finish.

Name: Merlot
Wine Description: Layering in vanilla and dark chocolate aromas, the vibrant cherry fruit flavors play against the chewy tannins and long, graceful finish.

Name: Bourgogne Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Intense red color, with flecks of rubis color. The nose offers a pleasant bouquet of flavors: red fruit notes release, enriched by fine blackcurrant and blueberry aromas. Ample and powerful on tasting, this wine expresses an interesting aromatic complexity, coated in soft tannins. Blueberry and coffee aromas still linger and offer an elegant and enjoyable finish.

Name: Pinot Noir
Wine Description: A ruby red Pinot with great color and aromas, this wine is full of intense strawberry, cherry, lavender, earthy woodsy notes and just a hint of dried roses. In taste, the strawberry and cherry remain, balanced by a rich, silky texture and spicy oak.
